titleStmt.title: The knight and the begger-wench. Which doth a wanton prank unfold, in as merry a story as ever was told. To the tune of, The king's delight: or, turn-coat, &c.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by and for A.M. and sold by the booksellers of London,

notesStmt.note: Date of publication suggested by Wing.
Verse: "I met with a jovial beggar ..."
Item at A3:2[82] imperfect: torn at head and foot with loss of text.
Item at A5:2[188] imperfect: trimmed with loss of imprint.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
